title: Toxic Electricity
description: Random aches and pains? Fatigue? Insomnia? Headaches? Facial pains? Sore eyes? Irregular heartbeats? Sick kids? Relationship problems? Blotchy skin? Hot skin? Anxiety? The second edition of Toxic Electricity takes a look at the electrical system and asks the Is this one of the most toxic endeavors that humanity has ever engaged in?
author: Steven Magee
